direction.raw_text: I'd say it's a soft sixty, sir. I'm virtually certain there's some high value target there, I'm just not sure it's bin Laden. The CIA Director leans back in his chair.

direction.raw_text: She pushes through the busy SEALs. Maya sees it now - way in the corner of the hangar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She walks and walks towards the bag. She is alone with it now. She unzips the BAG CU: Maya. Seven years telescoping to this moment. The end of a journey. She stares at the body for a moment then turns to look across the room where ADMIRAL MCRAVEN meets her eye. She nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, the agency expert gave a visual confirmation. Yes, Sir, the girl. Hundred percent. Maya gazes at the bloodied face, then turns away and zips the bag...and leaves the tent. Her eyes afire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maya waits on the tarmac, alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: one of the largest most impressive planes in the American fleet, rolls to a stop and the hatch opens. She climbs the ladder -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cavernous cargo plane is empty of passengers. The pilot motions to the seats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you Maya?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the only name they gave me. (ODD) You can sit wherever you want, you're the only one on the manifest.
direction.name: direction
